a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: How much global land is used as pasture for livestock? World
The extent of global pasture used for livestock grazing. It does not include cropland used to grow animal feed.
Data source: Taylor & Rising (2021); Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2024); HYDE (2023)
